title: FileNotFoundError after upgrading -- FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: (wrong project path)

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
OS: Windows 10
DeepLabCut Version: 2.2b8
Anaconda Environment

I upgraded to the latest update of the maDLC that I have had some issues to work correctly previously, and when trying to re-train the previous model (after some reading of different issues on this site) I got the error pasted below. It makes complete sense that the file is not found as there is no such directory. It seems the issue is that the path of the metadataset gets appended to the project_path, but I do not know how to adjust this as there is only the project path in the config file and also it was not an issue before the update. How do I correct this?
```python

Selecting multi-animal trainer
Config:
{'Task': None,
 'TrainingFraction': None,
 'all_joints': [[0], [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], [7]],
 'all_joints_names': ['nose',
                      'leftear',
                      'rightear',

 'min_input_size': 64,
 'mirror': False,
 'move2corner': None,
 'multi_step': [[0.0001, 7500], [5e-05, 12000], [1e-05, 200000]],

FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'C:\\Users\\idavalik\\DLC\\ObsLear-Idavr-2021-01-17\\dlc-models\\iteration-0\\ObsLearJan17-trainset95shuffle1\\train\\training-datasets\\iteration-0\\UnaugmentedDataSet_ObsLearJan17\\ObsLear_Idavr95shuffle1.pickle'
```
